Package ohos.multimodalinput.event

Class CompositeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimodalinput.event.MultimodalEvent
      • ohos.multimodalinput.event.CompositeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MouseEvent

    public abstract class CompositeEvent
extends MultimodalEvent
    Defines composite events specific to common devices.

    An example of input device can be the mouse. For mouse, MouseEvent falls into two types: KeyEvent and ManipulationEvent. With CompositeEvent, you can combine all mouse events into a composite event, making event processing easier.

    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    ManipulationEvent, MouseEvent, KeyEvent
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.MultimodalInput#MULTIMODAL_INPUT
